languages.text: If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder equips two pistols, they gain +10 BS and +10% hit chance. Base armour property: +15% dodge if the wielder's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.
If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 Ballistic Skill and +10% hit chance. Base armour property: +15% dodge if the wearer's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.

languages.text: 如果装备者同时装备两把手枪，则会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的弹道技能超过70，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者同时装备两把手枪，则会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的弹道技能超过70，获得+15%%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur est équipé de deux pistolets, il bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} et de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} si la Compétence balistique de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.
languages.original_text: If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur est équipé de deux pistolets, il bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} et de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétence{/g} Balistique de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger zwei Pistolen führt, erhalten diese +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, falls die Ballistik-Fähigkeit des Trägers höher als 70 ist.
languages.original_text: If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger zwei Pistolen führt, erhalten diese +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} des Trägers höher als 70 ist.

languages.text: 使用者がピストルを2丁装備している場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g} +10および{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g} +10%を獲得する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の射撃技能が70以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} +15%。
languages.original_text: If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Ballistic {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がピストルを2丁装備している場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g} +10および{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g} +10%を獲得する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の弾道{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}が70以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g} +15%。

languages.text: При использовании двух пистолетов {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} увеличивается на 10, а {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} — на 10%. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}, если значение Дальнего Боя больше 70.

traits.locale_text: При использовании двух пистолетов {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} увеличивается на 10, а {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} — на 10%. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}, если значение Дальнего Боя больше 70.
